content.description: One bolt that is the first protection.  From there the route is trad and protectable.  Good line, able to protect the crux which is low on the wall.  This route has its own rappel anchors (which is not identified in Squeezing the Lemmon II).
content.location: Second route from the climber's left.

content.description: Sporty climb on good rock.  There are three bolts on this route but you only need the first.  The rest of the route goes nicely on gear.
content.protection: 3 draws if you clip all the bolts and your standard rack.
content.location: Far left side of the wall.  High first bolt.  Lower from fixed anchors.

content.description: Stiff 5.9 moves on sport section below lead to easier trad section above.
content.protection: 5 bolts on bottom half, chain anchors at top

content.description: 5 bolts from the ground lead to trad gear line shared with Blood Simple to the right.  The trad gear line is easier then the grade.  Recommend stick clipping the first bolt or clipping that first draw on rappel after finishing Blood Simple or Raising Arizona.  The bottom is thin face climbing.
content.protection: Quick draws and a light trad rack of single cams and nuts is plenty.
content.location: Third right from the climber's left.

content.description: Route starts with 2 bolts then has a section of trad and finally a few more bolts to a 2 chain anchor (shared with Family Unit).  A cam can be easily placed after second bolt, followed by very sparse gear then to the next bolt.  This middle trad section is easier then the grade. 2 bolts protect the upper portion.
content.location: Furthest route on the climber's right side of the wall.

content.description: The crux is at start. Follow  groove and water polished face to the easy upper chimney.
content.protection: Nut's and Camalots to #4   2 bolt chain anchor.
content.location: Obvious groove system and chimney on the left end of cliff.

content.description: Nice sunny crag. This Crag doesn't show many sign's of use, but it's worth visiting if you want to try someplace different.
